name: Mega Jump Jump Color Game
description:
Mega Jump Jump is a simple but addictive click game about color and patience. The goal of the game is to bounce a small ball through the level by tapping the screen and navigate it through a series of colored shapes.

When starting the Mega Jump Jump game, you’ll see a small ball at the bottom of the screen and some larger colorful obstacles spinning around. Tap the screen to make the small colored ball jump. Pass as many obstacles as possible and go as high as you can. You’ll get points each time you pass an obstacle. More challenging obstacles will give more points. It’s important to pay attention to the color of the ball, because you can only jump through shapes with the same color. Wait until the spinning shapes match the ball’s color before you jump through it. In order to progress in this color Mega Jump Jump game, you should only enter the ball through an area of the obstacle which has the same colour as the ball.

The right timing is essential in Mega Jump Jump game, because hitting the wrong color will end the game and you’ll have to start over again. Be aware that the ball can switch its color any time! The challenge of the game is that the obstacles are moving or spinning, while the ball is changing color. It gets more and more difficult, since obstacles will move and spin faster over time.

How to play the game ‘Mega Jump Jump’?
- Tap the screen to start the game
- Keep tapping with your finger to make the color jump jump
- Pass the obstacles and avoid different colors
- Only touch obstacles with the same color as the ball
- Jump as high as you can
- Pay attention to the color of the ball
- Wait until the obstacle has the color of the ball
- Have fun

Music by Eric Matyas (www.soundimage.org)
